scripts.postinstall: yarn run i:1 && yarn run i:2 && yarn run i:3 && yarn run i:4 && yarn run i:5 && yarn run i:6 && yarn run i:7 && yarn run i:8
scripts.clean: node -e "fs.rmSync('node_modules', { force: true, recursive: true })" && yarn run c:1 && yarn run c:2 && yarn run c:3 && yarn run c:4 && yarn run c:5 && yarn run c:6 && yarn run c:7 && yarn run c:8
scripts.c:1: cd 1 && node -e "fs.rmSync('node_modules', { force: true, recursive: true })"
scripts.c:2: cd 2 && node -e "fs.rmSync('node_modules', { force: true, recursive: true })"
scripts.c:3: cd 3 && node -e "fs.rmSync('node_modules', { force: true, recursive: true })"
scripts.c:4: cd 4 && node -e "fs.rmSync('node_modules', { force: true, recursive: true })"
scripts.c:5: cd 5 && node -e "fs.rmSync('node_modules', { force: true, recursive: true })"
scripts.c:6: cd 6 && node -e "fs.rmSync('node_modules', { force: true, recursive: true })"
scripts.c:7: cd 7 && node -e "fs.rmSync('node_modules', { force: true, recursive: true })"
scripts.c:8: cd 8 && node -e "fs.rmSync('node_modules', { force: true, recursive: true })"
